item.title: Use Zap to Perform Dast
item.description: Introduction What is Dynamic Application Security Testing (DAST) What is ZAP How to use ZAP ZAP Scan for API Local Run Example - for API with Swagger For SOAP/GraphQL CircleCI Integrate Example - for API with Swagger For SOAP/GraphQL ZAP Scan for Application (with UI) Local Run for UI app CircleCI Integration for UI app Introduction What is Dynamic Application Security Testing (DAST) Dynamic application security testing (DAST) is a process of testing an application or software product in an operating state.
